name: nethercore-ai-plugins
description: Official AI-powered development plugins for Nethercore game development. Comprehensive tooling for ZX fantasy console game development, procedural asset generation, and game design workflows.

plugins.name: nethercore-zx-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive game development skill for Nethercore ZX fantasy console. Provides FFI specifications for Rust/C/Zig, asset pipeline guidance, project structure templates, and CLI tooling knowledge.

plugins.name: nethercore-zx-procgen
plugins.description: Procedural asset generation for Nethercore ZX. Generate textures (Albedo, MRE, SSE, Matcaps), meshes (with UVs and vertex colors), skeletal animations (walk cycles, attacks, IK), rigid body animations (vehicles, robots), and sounds using any language or tool.

plugins.name: nethercore-zx-game-design
plugins.description: Game design workflow for Nethercore ZX - create GDDs, validate console constraints, and plan asset requirements.

plugins.name: nethercore-zx-orchestrator
plugins.description: Game development orchestrator for Nethercore ZX. Coordinates the full development pipeline across game-design, procgen, and zx-dev plugins.

plugins.name: nethercore-zx-publish
plugins.description: Publishing workflow for Nethercore ZX games. Covers ROM packaging with nether CLI, nether.toml manifest creation, platform upload, and marketing asset preparation (thumbnails, screenshots, descriptions).

plugins.name: nethercore-zx-test
plugins.description: Testing and quality assurance plugin for Nethercore ZX games. Provides sync testing, replay regression, benchmarking, and desync investigation workflows.

plugins.name: nethercore-zx-optimize
plugins.description: Optimization plugin for Nethercore ZX games. Provides resource budgeting guidance, optimization techniques, and automated analysis for ROM size, WASM, RAM, VRAM, and asset optimization.

plugins.name: nethercore-zx-cicd
plugins.description: CI/CD automation plugin for Nethercore ZX games. Provides GitHub Actions templates and workflow scaffolding for build, test, and release pipelines.

plugins.name: game-design
plugins.description: Platform-agnostic game design frameworks for fantasy console development - world building, character design, narrative, gameplay systems, and replayability engineering.
